text: The Open Road was a 20th-century American monthly magazine for teen boys. It focused on outdoor life, sports, and other subjects of interest to teen males. It was published from November 1919 to 1954. The magazine went through several title changes: The Open Road (November 1919); The Open Road for Boys (October 1925); Open Road: The Young People's Magazine (April 1950); and American Boy and Open Road (July 1953). Category:American teen magazines Category:American monthly magazines Category:Defunct magazines of the United States
title: The Open Road
